sentences.english: Today Dong is something of a celebrity in Chinese business circles.
sentences.chinese: 如今，董明珠已是商圈裏名角。

sentences.english: Then she soon became an abuser and a star inside the group.
sentences.chinese: 然後不久她加入了施虐併成爲裏面的一個名角。

sentences.english: Director is a Beijing Opera star, very admire to Mr. Shen. But Mr.
sentences.chinese: 盧局長是京劇名角，對沈先生非常仰慕。
